attributes.action: scrap plans for travel databases and other like it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the past 8 years we have seen a steady move towards the creation of a police state within Britain. 

Time and time again we have been told the reasons are combatting terrorism, crime and illegal immigration. 

However, the reach of the state has become to pervasive in our lives and threatens the very freedoms it claims such databases protect.
